SpellModifyFeature.Name: Savant Spell
SpellModifyFeature.Text: When you cast a spell, you can spend 1 sorcery point to use two additional Metamagic options on this spell. You can only use this Metamagic option once per spell.
SpellModifyFeature.Prerequisite: You must have the Arcane Prodigy sorcerous origin to take this option.
